meanings.definition: A drug used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed gemfibrozil to help with my high cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Many people take gemfibrozil to control their cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: I joked that gemfibrozil was like a superhero for my blood fats.
meanings.sent4: Gemfibrozil acts like a shield, protecting my arteries from cholesterol.
meanings.sent5: Taking gemfibrozil is like sending a cleaning crew to sweep away excess cholesterol.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication used to treat high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
meanings.sent1: Gemfibrozil is the name of the medicine that helps with high cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: When you have high cholesterol, your doctor might recommend gemfibrozil.
meanings.sent3: I thought it was funny that gemfibrozil sounded like a magical potion for cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medications, gemfibrozil is like a versatile tool for cholesterol management.
meanings.sent5: Gemfibrozil is the secret weapon against high cholesterol and triglycerides.

meanings.definition: A prescription medication that helps reduce the risk of heart disease.
meanings.sent1: Taking gemfibrozil as directed can lower the chances of heart problems.
meanings.sent2: Gemfibrozil is an important part of my heart health routine.
meanings.sent3: I imagined gemfibrozil as a tiny shield guarding my heart from disease.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against heart issues, gemfibrozil is a valuable ally.
meanings.sent5: Gemfibrozil is like a guardian angel for my heart, keeping it safe from harm.
